item.description:
My Action Board Workshop.

“Vision without action is a dream.

Action without vision is simply passing the time.

Action with Vision is making a positive difference.” - Joel Barker

 

 

 

 

Have your Vision Board put together for the new 2013 year?

Have your wishes listed?

Ready?

Set ...

Action!

Have you heard about Action Boards?

The truth is Action Boards are less popular than the easy to make and fun to have Vision Boards, probably because they need the investment of sufficient time and energy.

It is no doubt that Vision Boards narrow your focus on the beneficial things that you want to create in your life. They also help to keep a clear inner picture in your mind’s eye of what you want to evolve in and to attract energy for those wonderful changes.

Positive, bright images that are looking at you every day from your board help you to breathe deeper and keep your hope alive at challenging times...

But often having a very beautiful vision and even an amazing Vision Board is not enough. To keep the hope alive, we need some fuel - action. We need to act on our beautiful images so that they do not remain in a state of fantasy and pure dreams.

So the next and first step of moving forward toward your visions is creating an Action Board!

Making an Action Board is a more complicated activity than making a Vision Board. It requires inner concentration and gets your brain fully working. It involves the process of envisioning with your whole being how you will be transforming your dreams into reality, and putting that “how” on your “map” of eventually connected “roads” toward your vision.  You’ll be taught this simple mapping technique to create your Action Board during this class.

Your Action Board will become your map with a GPS that navigates your actions and invites you back from wasting time on procrastination, negative and self-sabotaging thoughts and actions.

Your Action Board will not be fully completed during the workshop, but you will get the idea of how to continue working with it during the year.

For those who have created their bright Vision Boards, this workshop is a great follow-up! Just bring the vision boards and drawings you’ve created to this class!

If you have missed the Vision Board workshop, you have have the option of waiting for another one next year, or contacting me for a private session. ~ organizer Angela Sokolova

“As I grow older I pay less attention to what men say.  I just watch what they do.” - Andrew Carnegie

When:

Friday. January 18th, 2012 @ 5pm-9pm

Price: $ 30.00

All materials will be provided!! (your own personal calendar, pictures, cardboard, glue sticks, markers, crayons, colored pencils, ribbons, stickers and even sparkles! plus tea for a good mood )

You will leave this workshop with  your holiday gift for yourself : your own custom-made 2013 Inspiring Actions Calendar full of YOUR wonderful goals, inspiring affirmations and pictures.
item.name: My Action Board Workshop
